description: A proven performer in the most severe alpine conditions, the Men's Alpinist Jacket will be your go-to for days breaking trail or chasing skin tracks. Built with ultra-durable, yet breathable Recycled GORE-TEX Pro, this waterproof jacket is here to keep you dry anytime the storm clouds gather. When the temps drop, pull up the attached hood and adjust the drawcord hem for extra coverage.
name: Marmot Alpinist GTX Jacket - Mens
